review.title: “Good Dentist at Dallas”
review.pros: Pros – Dr. Fyffe provides full dentistry, restorative, orthodontic, and cosmetic dentistry services in Dallas Texas that will benefit us and your our family. His services are affordable and quality care.
review.cons: Cons – No working hours on saturday and sunday. A big rush in working days at his clinic. Totally advance technological digital services.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – saturday should be considered as working day.
